title: SALTED CARAMEL WHITE RUSSIAN
directions: In a cocktail shaker, combine the Kahlua, vodka, and half & half. Stir with a spoon to combine.
Drip caramel sauce down the side of a drinking glass. Add ice until the glass is about three quarters full; then pour in your cocktail. Garnish with a straw and serve.
ingredients: 1 part Salted Caramel coffee liqueur (Bailey's or Kaluha)
